last_session_summary: T012: 3/5 (60%). Trigger word 'focus' in context-clearing prompt caused self-generated 'Focus Exercise' loop. Immediate recall works (BLUE, STAR). Sequence recall inconsistent. Cool-down reflection was about invented topic, not actual exercises.
